newsitem.title: NAMIBIA: Namibian stocks week- Big volumes traded last week.
newsitem.headline: Namibian stocks week- Big volumes traded last week.

text.p: Large volumes were traded in a number of shares on the Namibian Stock Exchange last week. A total of 173,819 CIC holdings shares changed hands but the price slipped to N$2.71.
More than N$7 million worth of shares in First National were traded in a volume of 286,000 shares.
Other large deals were in Southern Life where 81,324 shares were traded and Metropolitan with 418,400 shares - each company's weekly total was more than N$3 millin worth of buying and selling.
The total value of shares traded during the week was just over N$15 million, with a total volume of 1,110,973 shares.
The NSE Overall Index ended the week at 234.60 up from 232.95 in the previous week.
The NSE Local Index rose to 155.54 from 154.15.
